# Aufgabe




```{r}
data(datasaurus_dozen)

datasets <- datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  distinct(dataset) %>% 
  unlist()

d_selected <- sample(datasets, 1)


d <- 
  datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  filter(dataset == d_selected)

ggplot(d, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
    geom_point() +
    theme_void() +
    theme(legend.position = "none")
```



Answerlist

* -.90 
* 0
* +.90
* 1
* -1
